Header: PRIME MINISTER INSTRUCTS TO RELEASE 2 BILLION TO IMPORT FERTILIZER
Content: Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa has stated that 2 billion rupees would be released to state fertilizer companies to import fertilizer to ease the current shortage. MP Chandima Weerakkody quoted the PM saying this in the Governmentâ€™s parliamentary group meeting held at the Presidential Secretariat today. It is reported that certain fertilizer companies have limited the import as they have to charge an outstanding balance of 6 billion rupees in the past.
